sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./../Styles/AiInterview.css"; const AIinterview = () => { const [seconds, setSeconds] = useState(0); const [isSpeaking, setIsSpeaking] = useState(false); const [showWaiting, setShowWaiting] = useState(true); // Start header timer useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setSeconds((prev) => prev + 1); }, 1000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); // Format seconds to MM:SS const formatTime = (sec) => { const minutes = Math.floor(sec / 60) .toString() .padStart(2, "0"); const secs = (sec % 60).toString().padStart(2, "0"); return `${minutes}:${secs}`; }; // Start waves / AI speaking automatically useEffect(() => { setIsSpeaking(true); setShowWaiting(false); // Assuming wave animation total duration is ~1.8s per cycle * 4 iterations const waveDuration = 1.8 * 4 * 1000; // 7200ms ~7.2s const waveTimer = setTimeout(() => { setIsSpeaking(false); // Show "Waiting for Response" after 5 sec const waitTimer = setTimeout(() => { setShowWaiting(true); }, 5000); return () => clearTimeout(waitTimer); }, waveDuration); return () => clearTimeout(waveTimer); }, []); return ( <> <>

Real-time AI interviewer tailored to your job role

● Waiting for Response {formatTime(seconds)}

CURRENT QUESTION

Tell me about yourself and your experience in software development.

Upcoming Questions

  • What motivated you to apply for this position? Easy · Behavioral
  • Describe a challenging project you worked on and how you overcome obstacles. Medium · Problem Solving
  • How do you handle tight deadlines and pressue in a fast-paced environment? Medium · Stress Management
  • Explain a situation where you had to work witha different team memeber. Hard · Teamwork

); }; export default AIinterview;
